title: Student Sea Turtle Conservation Network
short_description: Protected multiple turtle nests, contributing to safe hatching of 600+ endangered Olive Ridley turtles
full_description: Participated in annual 7 km coastal walks from Neelangarai to Besant Nagar. Participated in night patrols and the safe transport of hatchlings to the shoreline. Assisted in protecting multiple turtle nests, contributing to the safe hatching of 600+ turtles. The Students Sea Turtle Conservation Network is a voluntary group, mainly comprising students and young adults who have been working in the beaches of Chennai since 1987 to conserve and create awareness about the endangered Olive Ridley turtle.
